5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Wa’il that ‘Abdullah said:“I prayed one night with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and he kept standing until I thought of doing something bad.” I said: “What was that?”He said: “I thought of sitting down and leaving him.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي طُولِ الْقِيَامِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning standing for a long time in Prayer
